item.title: On lattice free MMI and Chain models in Kaldi
item.description: Recently, I came across this paper which compares several sequence discriminative training criteria based on the popular lattice-free MMI (LF-MMI) objective, and concludes that “boosted” LF-MMI outperforms others consistently. Since I couldn’t find the code publicly available, I set out to implement it myself in Kaldi. The idea was that even if the claim turned out to be false, this would give me a hands-on experience with C++ level implementations in Kaldi.
